mapper.sql: id, encrypt_id, encounter_id, encounter_encrypt_id, left_img, right_img, left_video, right_video, collect_file, l_mydriasis, r_mydriasis, l_conjunctiva, r_conjunctiva, l_cornea, r_cornea, l_anterior_chamber_depth, r_anterior_chamber_depth, l_anterior_chamber_status, r_anterior_chamber_status, l_iris, r_iris, l_pupil_diameter, r_pupil_diameter, l_pupil_status, r_pupil_status, l_pupil_direct_light_reflection, r_pupil_direct_light_reflection, l_pupil_indirect_light_reflection, r_pupil_indirect_light_reflection, l_pupil_rapd, r_pupil_rapd, l_lens, r_lens, l_nucleus_chaos_lev, r_nucleus_chaos_lev, l_intraocular_lens, r_intraocular_lens, l_vitreum, r_vitreum, cover, remark, report_status, note, create_time, last_update_time, is_delete
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE `t_anterior_segment` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键ID', `encrypt_id` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '加密ID', `encounter_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '就诊记录ID', `encounter_encrypt_id` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '加密的就诊记录ID', `left_img` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼图片', `right_img` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼图片', `left_video` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼视频', `right_video` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼视频', `collect_file` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '图像采集', `l_mydriasis` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼是否散瞳（0.未散瞳 1.已散瞳）', `r_mydriasis` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼是否散瞳（0.未散瞳 1.已散瞳）', `l_conjunctiva` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼结膜（1.正常 2.充血水肿 3.乳头滤泡 4.假膜 5.睫状充血 6.混合型充血 7.翼状胬肉 9.其他）', `r_conjunctiva` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼结膜（1.正常 2.充血水肿 3.乳头滤泡 4.假膜 5.睫状充血 6.混合型充血 7.翼状胬肉 9.其他）', `l_cornea` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼角膜（1.透明 2.新生血管 3.上皮脱落 4.浸润 5.溃疡 6.水肿 7.后弹力层褶皱 8.大泡 9.云翳 10.瘢痕 11.变性 99.其他）', `r_cornea` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼角膜（1.透明 2.新生血管 3.上皮脱落 4.浸润 5.溃疡 6.水肿 7.后弹力层褶皱 8.大泡 9.云翳 10.瘢痕 11.变性 99.其他）', `l_anterior_chamber_depth` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼前房深度（1.正常 2.浅 3.深 9.其他）', `r_anterior_chamber_depth` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼前房深度（1.正常 2.浅 3.深 9.其他）', `l_anterior_chamber_status` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼前房状况（1.清 2.闪辉 3.渗出 4.细胞 5.积脓 6.积血 9.其他）', `r_anterior_chamber_status` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼前房状况（1.清 2.闪辉 3.渗出 4.细胞 5.积脓 6.积血 9.其他）', `l_iris` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼虹膜（1.纹理清晰 2 纹理不清晰 3.节段性萎缩 4.异色 5. 结节 6.新生血管 7.残膜 8.根不离断 9.其他）', `r_iris` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼虹膜（1.纹理清晰 2 纹理不清晰 3.节段性萎缩 4.异色 5. 结节 6.新生血管 7.残膜 8.根不离断 9.其他）', `l_pupil_diameter` float(3,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼瞳孔直径（单位mm）', `r_pupil_diameter` float(3,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼瞳孔直径（单位mm）', `l_pupil_status` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼瞳孔状况（1.圆 2.不规则 3.移位 4.后粘连 5.多瞳 6.闭锁 7.膜闭 9.其他）', `r_pupil_status` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼瞳孔状况（1.圆 2.不规则 3.移位 4.后粘连 5.多瞳 6.闭锁 7.膜闭 9.其他）', `l_pupil_direct_light_reflection` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼瞳孔直接对光反射（1.正常 2.迟钝 3.消失）', `r_pupil_direct_light_reflection` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼瞳孔直接对光反射（1.正常 2.迟钝 3.消失）', `l_pupil_indirect_light_reflection` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼瞳孔间接对光反射（1.正常 2.迟钝 3.消失）', `r_pupil_indirect_light_reflection` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼瞳孔间接对光反射（1.正常 2.迟钝 3.消失）', `l_pupil_rapd` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼瞳孔RAPD（1.阴性 2.阳性）', `r_pupil_rapd` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼瞳孔RAPD（1.阴性 2.阳性）', `l_lens` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼晶状体（1.透明 2.皮质浑浊 3.核浑浊 4.后囊浑浊 5.人工晶体）', `r_lens` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼晶状体（1.透明 2.皮质浑浊 3.核浑浊 4.后囊浑浊 5.人工晶体）', `l_nucleus_chaos_lev` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼核浑浊分级（1.Ⅰ级 2.Ⅱ级 3.Ⅲ级 4.Ⅳ级 5.Ⅴ级），晶状体选择“核浑浊”时录入', `r_nucleus_chaos_lev` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼核混沌分级（1.Ⅰ级 2.Ⅱ级 3.Ⅲ级 4.Ⅳ级 5.Ⅴ级），晶状体选择“核浑浊”时录入', `l_intraocular_lens` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼人工晶体（1.IOL在位 2.IOL移位 3.无晶体）,晶状体选择“人工晶体”时录入', `r_intraocular_lens` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼人工晶体（1.IOL在位 2.IOL移位 3.无晶体）,晶状体选择“人工晶体”时录入', `l_vitreum` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '左眼玻璃体（1.清 2.浑浊 3.闪辉 4.细胞 5.出血 6.PVD 9.其他）', `r_vitreum` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '右眼玻璃体（1.清 2.浑浊 3.闪辉 4.细胞 5.出血 6.PVD 9.其他）', `cover` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '检查封面', `remark` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '备注', `report_status` int(1) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未出报告，1已出报告', `note` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '检查简述', `create_time` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `last_update_time` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `is_delete` int(1) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除标志（0：未删除，1：已删除）', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fk_anterior_segment_encounter_record_idx` (`encounter_id`) USING BTREE, CONSTRAINT `fk_encounter_anterior_segment` FOREIGN KEY (`encounter_id`) REFERENCES `t_encounter` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='眼前节检查';

r_conjunctiva, l_cornea, r_cornea, l_anterior_chamber_depth, r_anterior_chamber_depth, l_anterior_chamber_status, r_anterior_chamber_status, l_iris, r_iris, l_pupil_diameter, r_pupil_diameter, l_pupil_status, r_pupil_status, l_pupil_direct_light_reflection, r_pupil_direct_light_reflection, l_pupil_indirect_light_reflection, r_pupil_indirect_light_reflection, l_pupil_rapd, r_pupil_rapd, l_lens, r_lens, l_nucleus_chaos_lev, r_nucleus_chaos_lev, l_intraocular_lens, r_intraocular_lens, l_vitreum, r_vitreum, cover, remark, report_status, note, create_time, last_update_time, is_delete) mapper.update:
update t_anterior_segment
encrypt_id = #{encryptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
encounter_id = #{encounterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
encounter_encrypt_id = #{encounterEncryptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
left_img = #{leftImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
right_img = #{rightImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
left_video = #{leftVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
right_video = #{rightVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
collect_file = #{collectFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
l_mydriasis = #{lMydriasis,jdbcType=INTEGER},
r_mydriasis = #{rMydriasis,jdbcType=INTEGER},
l_conjunctiva = #{lConjunctiva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_conjunctiva = #{rConjunctiva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
l_cornea = #{lCornea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_cornea = #{rCornea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
l_anterior_chamber_depth = #{lAnteriorChamberDepth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_anterior_chamber_depth = #{rAnteriorChamberDepth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
l_anterior_chamber_status = #{lAnteriorChamberStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_anterior_chamber_status = #{rAnteriorChamberStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
l_iris = #{lIris,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_iris = #{rIris,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
l_pupil_diameter = #{lPupilDiameter,jdbcType=REAL},
r_pupil_diameter = #{rPupilDiameter,jdbcType=REAL},
l_pupil_status = #{lPupilStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_pupil_status = #{rPupilStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
l_pupil_direct_light_reflection = #{lPupilDirectLightReflection,jdbcType=INTEGER},
r_pupil_direct_light_reflection = #{rPupilDirectLightReflection,jdbcType=INTEGER},
l_pupil_indirect_light_reflection = #{lPupilIndirectLightReflection,jdbcType=INTEGER},
r_pupil_indirect_light_reflection = #{rPupilIndirectLightReflection,jdbcType=INTEGER},
l_pupil_rapd = #{lPupilRapd,jdbcType=INTEGER},
r_pupil_rapd = #{rPupilRapd,jdbcType=INTEGER},
l_lens = #{lLens,jdbcType=INTEGER},
r_lens = #{rLens,jdbcType=INTEGER},
l_nucleus_chaos_lev = #{lNucleusChaosLev,jdbcType=INTEGER},
r_nucleus_chaos_lev = #{rNucleusChaosLev,jdbcType=INTEGER},
l_intraocular_lens = #{lIntraocularLens,jdbcType=INTEGER},
r_intraocular_lens = #{rIntraocularLens,jdbcType=INTEGER},
l_vitreum = #{lVitreum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_vitreum = #{rVitreum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_status = #{reportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

#{rPupilDiameter,jdbcType=REAL}, l_pupil_status = #{lPupilStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_pupil_status = #{rPupilStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, l_pupil_direct_light_reflection = create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
